name: ROBOX (itch) (kittlish)
description:
Build your robot, then pit it against a randomized robot in an AI battle!

Entry for Shenanijam 2019 - DNA Chaos

Achievements: + Sweet 16 + Mozart + One Punch Man + Fourwheeler

Lead Programmer: Thomas Bestvina

Lead Designer: kittlish

Art by Marecht

Music by kittlish
